description.name: usdcbep20
description.tagline: USDC bep20 Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto bep20-usdc Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept USDC bep20 directly on your website
Unique bep20/usdc receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your bep20/usdc wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
